extendedInfo.description: City Index Android Mobile AppTrade wherever you are with the City Index Android Mobile App.The City Index Android Mobile App is an essential tool for managing your trading account, while providing full and secure access to trade the market wherever, whenever.The City Index Android Mobile App allows you to:â¢ Check the latest prices and market movements instantly across a range of FX pairs and CFD marketsâ¢ Trade, place and amend existing ordersâ¢ Research prices through real-time charts from the palm of your handâ¢ Take advantage of Leverage-to-Suit and Price Tolerance â¢ View and amend multiple Watch Listsâ¢ Review trade and order historyâ¢ Be confident that all your information and transactions are securePlease note: You need a live City Index trading account to use the City Index Android Mobile App.For more information, please visit www.cityindex.comAbout Forex TradingThe most widely traded market in the world, forex trading is the act of simultaneously buying one currency while selling another, primarily for the purpose of speculation. Currency values rise (appreciate) and fall (depreciate) against each other due to a number of factors including economics and geopolitics. The common goal of forex traders is to profit from these changes in the value of one currency against another by actively speculating on which way forex prices are likely to turn in the future.About CFD TradingCFD trading enables you to take a position on a range of global markets, including indices and commodities. You can trade on rising as well as falling markets, meaning that you can profit even when markets are on the decline. Why City Index?We believe that our offering is both powerful and unrivalled in the retail forex industry.As a City Index client, you can enjoy multiple innovative tools and resources to help you to improve your trading experience, whilst our Advantage Platform technology has been designed to give you a distinct advantage over other retail forex and CFD traders.Apply Now, Trade NowApply for a trading account at www.cityindex.comCity Index is a trading name of City Index Limited. Forex and CFDs are leverage products, carrying a high level of risk to your capital with the possibility of losing more than your initial investment and may not be suitable for some investors. Ensure you fully understand the risks involved and seek independent advice if necessary.For more technical information please visit our website at www.cityindex.com

reviews.title: Recent update
reviews.comment: The recent update has messed up the auto-resume function on the app
reviews.author: La Manga

reviews.title: OK but needs Aus timezone
reviews.comment: Can\'t set chart timezone to Aus.
reviews.author: Paul Trehearne

reviews.title: Poor app
reviews.comment: This app on android is pathetic and very slow. City index need to seriously improve otherwise they will be losing a lot of customers. Why would you need a margin calculator? Seems a bit of a gimic and a very pointless one.
reviews.author: Priyan Shah

reviews.title: Needs improvement
reviews.comment: No choice to key in multiple limit orders, pls fix!
reviews.author: Derrick Koh

reviews.title: Basic but it works
reviews.comment: Simple but good, the downloadable program is more advanced.
reviews.author: David B

reviews.title: Works well on note 2
reviews.comment: Quite good and above my expectation! Keep up the good work
reviews.author: Hans Wahyudin

reviews.title: Absolutely terrible... again
reviews.comment: Such an awful application. I could go ahead and describe  the bugs but there are too many. Appalling.
reviews.author: Mahesh Ashra

reviews.title: Citi index upgrade
reviews.comment: New upgrade same bugs. Why are these not being sorted. Crashes constantly on my Samsung note running ics. If left for a few minutes and I flip back to it then it stops and eventually get the dreaded black screen of death telling me its stopped running and about to crash. Only app I have this problem with. Come on guys get it right.
reviews.author: Simon O\'Rourke

reviews.title: Great on my s3
reviews.comment: Super quick and reliable so far. Thanks for sorting it city
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Often crashes
reviews.comment: Useful when it works.  Often wont connect.  Often crashes.
reviews.author: brent crouch
